com.devtence.will.dev.models.users

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.devtence.will.dev.models.BaseModel<User>
      • com.devtence.will.dev.models.users.User
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthenticableEntity

    public class User
extends BaseModel<User>
implements AuthenticableEntity
    Class that models the User data and maps it's structure to the persistence layer, it also defines and implements the functions that can be performed with the Users.
    Since:
    2015-06-02
    Author:
    plessmann

      • goodLogin

        public boolean goodLogin(java.lang.String inputPassword)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Compares the inputPassword to the stored password using jasypt libraries, the password must be passed to this method in plain text
        Specified by:
